CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 9, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "Lionel Hampton and Marva Louis Are Acclaimed In Concert At Syria Mosque - The Aftermath - After the stirring swing concert at Syria Mosque Monday night, artists, as well as the audience, made a pilgrimage to the Loendi Club to finish the evening.  Teenie Harris, Courier staff photographer, trailed them and snapped these candid shots showing Marva Louis with admirers and Lionel Hampton surrounded by friends. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lionel Hampton shaking hands with man, with Marva Louis between them, in Loendi Club
